Txt_Talk_Greenlad_House_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110.Text: *: Well, I'll be! You're the first friendly face I've seen in I don't know how many years!
*: The last people I saw were those pirates who left that spooky old bone behind. Funny bunch...
*: Anyway, since you're here, you couldn't help me with something, could you? Have you heard of the mod rod?
*: You have? Wonderful! Well, I'll put it bluntly<--->I want the bally thing! Ho ho ho! What a brazen old so-and-so I am!
*: No? It's a wand they say can change you into anything you like. Last I heard, the king of a place called Manoza had it.
*: If you've got that ultimate key, you can get down there in a jiffy via the old teleportal...
*: Well, I'll be! If it isn't the mod rod! The very item I've been after all these years!
*: You must let me have it! I'll give you, um...let me see... Ah! How about this lovely old boatman's bone here?
*: You're happy with that? Well, I'll b<---> I mean, um...lovely! Here you go. One boatman's bone<--->barely used!
{LEADER} is hastily relieved of the mod rod, and handed the boatman's bone.
*: Oh, thank you! Thank you very, very much indeed! You've made an old man happy! Ho ho ho hooo!
*: Not tempted? Can't blame you, I suppose... (sigh) Never mind! Ho ho! Ho...ho.
*: Well, hello there! It's not very often I get visitors all the way out here!
*: Don't look so frightened! It's only little old me!
*: What do you think you're doing, sneaking into people's homes, hm? Clear off! Go on!
*: Well, hello there! Do you like what I've done with the place? I've been dying to show you!
*: Humans! Filthy, horrible, humans! I'm going to eat you all up! Grrrrrr! Nom nom nom! (slobber)

Txt_Talk_Greenlad_Out_SUB_0_VOLUME_0010_.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...
Bleating brilliant! Off I trot then.
